name: Pain Keeper

skills.name: Unflagging Advance
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10%.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +10%
Level 6: Damage +10%
Damage Multiplier: DEF + ATK

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.book_value: Value to fully book ex faster cooldown, more damage or debuff chance, etc.
skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Spectacular Sweep (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies, then heals all allies by 15% of this Champion’s MAX HP.
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Heal +10%
Level 6: Heal +15%
Level 7: Damage +15%
Level 8: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 0.12 HP + 2 ATK

skills.name: Combat Tactics (Cooldown: 7 turns)
skills.description:
Decreases the cooldown of all allies skills by 1 turn.
Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1
Level 4: Cooldown -1
